title: Lemongrass + Argan Stem Cell Conditioner - 8 oz - Liquid
description: Lemongrass + Argan Stem Cell Conditioner by Acure Organics 8 oz Liquid Lemongrass Argan Stem Cell Conditioner 8 oz Liquid Product This daily nourishing conditioner provides vital moisture to combat everyday tangles and buildup. Promotes shiny soft healthy clean hair. Organic Argan Oil Argan Stem Cells CoQ10 help support hair keratin and strengthen the follicle connection. Organic Avocado Oil provides vitamin B12 and Organic Fair Trade Certified Cocoa Butter provides moisture. Safe for color treated hair. Voted Best Conditioner Ever by my Mom. title: Phytoworx Organic Hair Loss Shampoo | With Plant Stem Cells for Hair Recovery and Regrowth
description:
PhytoWorx plant stem cells (Malus Domestica) organic blend hair loss shampoo using only the rarest Switzerland plant stem cells with organic ingredients such as tea tree, peppermint, eucalyptus and rosemary oils shown to drastically improve scalp condition and put an end to hair loss.

Organic blend shampoo with absolutely no sulfates!
